entities.name: two-way mirror
entities.description: A two-way mirror is described as a device used by James and Harry to communicate with each other when they were in separate detentions. It allows the speaker to appear in the other person's mirror.

entities.name: mirror of erised
entities.description: The Mirror of Erised is described as a magical object that shows the viewer their heart's desire. Harry saw his dead parents in it four years ago.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is mentioned as someone who used to use two-way mirrors with Harry when they were in separate detentions.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is mentioned as someone Harry wants to talk to. He is also referred to as 'Harry's godfather' (not explicitly stated in this chapter but mentioned in previous chapters).

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who uses the two-way mirror to try and talk to Sirius.
